description:
11.32 colorcontrast
Adjust color contrast between RGB components.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: colorcontrast

options.description: Set the red-cyan contrast. Defaults is 0.0. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0.
options.name: rc

options.description: Set the green-magenta contrast. Defaults is 0.0. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0.
options.name: gm

options.description: Set the blue-yellow contrast. Defaults is 0.0. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0.
options.name: by

options.description: Set the weight of each rc, gm, by option value. Default value is 0.0. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. If all weights are 0.0 filtering is disabled.
options.name: rcw

options.description: Set the weight of each rc, gm, by option value. Default value is 0.0. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. If all weights are 0.0 filtering is disabled.
options.name: gmw

options.description: Set the weight of each rc, gm, by option value. Default value is 0.0. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. If all weights are 0.0 filtering is disabled.
options.name: byw

options.description: Set the amount of preserving lightness. Default value is 0.0. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0.
options.name: pl
